{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3561961,"name":"Erik","username":"ejb8746","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/e/c68b51/{size}.png","created_at":"2025-03-19T17:41:54.834Z","cooked":"

Hi all - we broke our RoboRio 2 at district event this past weekend and had to go to our Rio1 mid-event. The RoboRio 2 seems backordered and we couldn’t find a backup to our Rio1 in our network. Does anyone have an extra Rio1 that we can borrow as backup for this weekend’s event? We are in Raleigh, NC.

4795 has some spare Rio 1s and is in Chapel Hill - PM me or email admin@eastbots.com and we can coordinate pickup

Hi guys, we (the Gearcats) have a spare RIO 1 and we’ll bring it to Pitt this weekend for you.

BTW, we have a RIO 2 but we don’t trust it, it died completely on us at THOR a couple years ago and it’s been flaky since, suspicious of the SD card slot. We ran with RIO 1s in 2024 and this year.

It seems like you found one, but just a reminder that Spare Parts at events has both RoboRIO 1 and 2’s available for loan for the event duration.

Note: apparently the SD cards for the RoboRIO 2’s may not be stocked, however.

","post_number":7,"post_type":1,"posts_count":8,"updated_at":"2025-03-20T04:50:09.202Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":88,"readers_count":87,"score":22.6,"yours":false,"topic_id":496232,"topic_slug":"extra-rio-available-in-nc","display_username":"Peter Johnson","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":13575,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"Volunteer WPILib Developer, CSA"},"post_url":"/t/extra-rio-available-in-nc/496232/7","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3563220,"name":"Bob Bell","username":"rjbell4","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/r/8c91f0/{size}.png","created_at":"2025-03-20T19:03:32.218Z","cooked":"

Wow, really, your Rio died, too? Ours also mysteriously went belly-up between Saturday night and Sunday morning. What are we doing to our Rios, NC?

Peter_Johnson:

just a reminder that Spare Parts at events has both RoboRIO 1 and 2’s available for loan for the event duration

We finished our event with a CSA-loaned Rio 2, for which we are very grateful.
